# applySnapshot(_:toSection:animatingDifferences:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the section UI to reflect the state of the data in the specified snapshot, optionally animating the UI changes and executing a completion handler.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func applySnapshot(_ snapshot: NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshotReference, toSection sectionIdentifier: Any, animatingDifferences: Bool, completion: (() -> Void)? = nil)
```

## Updating section data

- **snapshot(forSection:)**: Returns a representation of the current state of the data in the specified section of the collection view.
- **applySnapshot(_:toSection:animatingDifferences:)**: Updates the section UI to reflect the state of the data in the specified snapshot, optionally animating the UI changes.
